title: Hands-on: eBay’s refreshed refurbished program offers the best iPhone 12 value on the market
content:
Earlier this week, eBay rolled out the latest expansion to its Certified Refurbished Program. Growing the cast of retailers and listings even further from last November’s refresh, we’re taking a hands-on look at just what to expect by buying a refurbished iPhone 12 from eBay. Detailing the unboxing experience, cosmetic conditions, and more, head below for a closer look.

more…

The post Hands-on: eBay’s refreshed refurbished program offers the best iPhone 12 value on the market appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: eBay refurbished iPhone 12 mini delivers plenty of value with added savings attached and we're going hands-on to detail the experience.
